Interface Row

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface Row
extends java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>
    One row of a data table.

    • Method Detail

      • value

        @Nullable
java.lang.Object value(java.lang.String key)
        Get the value at a particular column.
        Parameters:
        key - The column name.
        Returns:
        The value at that column.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if key does not define a column.

      • value

        @Nullable
java.lang.Object value(int idx)
        Get the value at a particular column.
        Parameters:
        idx - The column index.
        Returns:
        The value at that column.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if idx is not a valid column index.
